DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the role of fenestrated/branched stent-grafts in the exclusion of abdominal aortic and thoracoabdominal aneurysms.
DOC.brief_title: Endovascular Exclusion of TAAA/AAA Utilizing Fenestrated/Branched Stent Grafts
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the role of fenestrated/branched stent-grafts in the exclusion of abdominal aortic and thoracoabdominal aneurysms. The evaluation shall be conducted with subjects that would be expected to have great difficulty tolerating open surgical repair and anatomies not suitable for devices currently marketed.
DOC.criteria: 1. At least 18 years of age. 2. Not pregnant 3. Willing and able to comply with twoyear followup period. 4. Willing and able to give informed consent prior to enrollment 5. No known allergy to stainless steel or polyester 6. No history of anaphylactic reaction to contrast material with an inability to properly prophylax the patient appropriately. 7. Life expectancy greater than two years 8. High risk candidate for open surgical repair see above
